title: President Mahinda Rajapaksa celebrates his 67th Birthday. Series of religious ceremonies worldwide.
content: By Janaka Alahapperuma – Pix by: Chandana Perera Series of religious ceremonies have been organized worldwide throughout this week by the people of Sri Lanka to mark the President Mahinda Rajapaksa’s 67th birthday and also the second anniversary relating to his second ascension to the presidency….
